name: Mental World
description:
Feel - Relax - Reflex 

The mental world is a world built for your mental health.

You can experience that feeling by floating in the sky through the Feel portal.

You can calm yourself in the vast calmness of the sea.

You can test your reflexes by going through the reflex portal.

The mental world lets you do all this in one world.

Controls:

W - A - S - D  --> Movement

Space --> Fly (in Feel)

Esc -->Back to World
